GM5AUD.original: ~z~I'm screwed either way. If I don't give you the diamonds, you kill me here and you take 'em.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~反正我怎么着都是死。要是不给你们钻石，你们在这儿就会杀了我拿走它。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Serves you right, you selfish cocksucking piece of shit.
~z~Just leaves his boys to clear up.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~只是留下一群小弟替他清场。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Our paths crossed back when I was living in Hove Beach as well.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~我们的人生轨迹在Hove Beach又交汇了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~I don't care what you did to that man, but we ain't leaving here without them diamonds.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~你跟他的纠纷我不感兴趣，但是没拿到钻石我们就不走了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~You might be right, Niko. Whose fucking diamonds were they anyway?
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~说不定是这样，Niko。说起来这傻逼钻石到底是谁的？

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Packie, this is great. You've finally found a woman who will sit down and listen to your shit.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~Packie，这下可好。你终于找到了一个会坐下来听你逼逼的女人了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Fuck, fuck, fuck. All that trouble for nothing.
~z~Niko, my man, you gotta follow me.
~z~Yeah, but there is no guarantee we woulda made any money out of those diamonds anyway.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~对，但是也没人保证我们拿到钻石就一定能换到钱。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~That's a fucking tragedy. We should throw her a goodbye party.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~那还真他妈可惜。我们应该替她开一个送别派对。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Go to your fucking family. I don't want nothing to do with you.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~滚回你的家去吧。我不想和你扯上任何关系。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~We'll let you go if you give 'em up.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~交出钻石我们就放你一条生路。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Gonna get hitched. White picket fence and all that shit.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~马上就要结婚了，好日子还在后头呢。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Bulgarin lost a lot of money that night and he needed someone to blame.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~那天晚上Bulgarin损失了一大笔钱，他需要找一个人背锅。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Me and some biker had to try to sell them to a diamond dealer and it turns into a blood bath.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~我和一个飞车党想把它卖给一个钻石商，结果又成了一场血战。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~and his Dominican bitch, they stole my diamonds.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~还有他的多米尼加婊子，就是他们偷了我的钻石。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~I've got a suspicion those were the ones Ray Boccino got me to handle a while back.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~我怀疑那包钻石就是之前Ray Boccino让我去搞的那些。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~We'll let you go if you give 'em up.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~交出钻石我们就放你一条生路。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Is good they are on their way to a landfill somewhere. Best place for them.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~现在进了垃圾场正好，再合适不过了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~I don't think I'll be getting out anytime soon.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~我觉得我多半是别想出去了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~A guy like Gerry can still do stuff in the joint. He organized this kidnapping shit, didn't he?
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~Gerry这样的人就算在牢里也能做事，这次的绑架不就是他策划的吗？

GM5AUD.original: ~z~You got 'em, my man. Good fucking work.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~你解决他们了，哥们儿。太他妈漂亮了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Don't nobody having them. Screw all of you!
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~索性谁都拿不到，你们都见鬼去吧！

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Niko, me and Gracie is waiting for you just off a Frankfort Avenue in Northwood.
~z~We put the ice in the middle, we walk back.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~我们把钻石放在中间，然后退后。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~That's a real shame, I can see you fitting right in down in Hove Beach, Niko.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~那还真可惜，依我看你能在Hove Beach过得很好的，Niko。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~A ship sunk, the cargo sunk to the bottom of the sea, I had to swim for my life.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~有条船沉了，货都沉到了海底，我只能游泳逃生。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~And now he shows up claiming the ice belongs to him? What are the chances?
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~然后现在他就跳出来说钻石是他的了？有什么关联吗？

GM5AUD.original: ~z~A whole lot of trouble for jack fucking shit.
~z~And you have been trying to rob the thieves.
~z~The good news is everything is coming together.
~z~I do give you the diamonds, Mr. Bulgarin kills me later.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~要是把钻石给你们，Bulgarin先生之后会杀了我。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~That's the plan. Hopefully someone might bring a big present for us to this shindig as well.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~计划就是这样。很可能还会有人在这场饯行会上送我们一份大礼。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Kidnapping the bitch, holding onto her, fighting through them damn Russians... all of that for jack shit.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~绑架那个贱人，牢牢看住她，和这群狗日的俄国佬干架...全他妈成了狗屁。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Hopefully one day I will be able to teach him his lesson by putting a bullet through the back of his head.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~希望有一天我能用一发穿透他脑壳的子弹教训教训他。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~The population of Liberty City would have been higher if we had.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~早这样的话，自由城的人口总数也会高点。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~It is the story of a lot of lives, Packie. I'm getting used to hearing it.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~是很多人的日常，Packie。这话我都快听习惯了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Alright, I think I know who's got the ice. Follow me.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~好了，我想我知道钻石在谁手里了。跟我来。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~This was one of the reasons I leave Europe and come here to Liberty City.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~这是我离开欧洲来自由城的原因之一。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~I'd rather see you hanging from a fucking tree.
~z~-I'm here for you, sweetie.~n~-Hand over the fucking stuff!
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~－我是来救你的，宝贝。~n~－快他妈把东西交出来。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~There's good news and there's bad news.
~z~I hate that I'm the one that has to tell Gerald about this. Later on, man.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~为什么这种事一定要由我去告诉Gerald。回见，兄弟。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~but this is really gonna piss him off.
~z~Unfortunately, it turns out he wasn't our only problem.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~不过很不幸，我们的问题似乎不止他一个。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Look on the bright side, at least you got to meet Gracie.
~z~They're some more of them up there.
~z~You're not meant to say what you wish for out loud. It won't come true if you do.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~你不应该把愿望说出来的，说出来就不会实现了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~When you put it like this, I'm one lucky motherfucker, Packie.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~照你那么说，我这逼运气还挺好啊，Packie。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~I don't know about that. They're nobody's now.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~我也不清楚，现在谁的都不是了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Bulgarin, he the motherfucker who busted up our peaceful hostage exchange?
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~Bulgarin，就那个破坏了我们和平人质交易的狗逼玩意儿？

GM5AUD.original: ~z~You know you love it, Niko. Doesn't he Gracie?
~z~No, they stole them from the guys I sold them to.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~不是，他们是从我的买家那里偷来的。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Give her back, you animals. She's suffered enough.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~把她还回来，你们这些禽兽。别再折磨她了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Screw that. I got close to knocking her teeth out. That was about it. We ain't got shit now.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~放屁，我差点没把她的牙给打下来。就是这样，我们现在屁都没了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~I worked for him on the Adriatic, he thought I stole from him and he came after me.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~还在亚得里亚海的时候我就替他卖命，他觉得我偷了他东西就来追杀我。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Me brother, Gerald, is going to be one of them people.
~z~Well, Niko. That was a whole lot of effort for no fucking reward.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，Niko。又是屁回报都没有，工夫倒是费了不少。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~The ex-boyfriend of your girl, he's gonna to agree to the divorce terms.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~你那女人的前男友，他同意那份分手协议了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Maybe a big bag of diamonds will help us get over the pain of losing her.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~可能是能帮我们摆脱失去她的痛苦的一大包钻石。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~The only thing that makes me smile about this shit is that Bulgarin does not have the ice.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~唯一能让我笑出来的就是Bulgarin没拿到钻石。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Maybe we was going to have to give up them diamonds to fucking Ray Boccino but we woulda got a payday.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~可能我们是该把钻石都上交给Ray Boccino那个狗逼，那样我们至少还能拿到点钱。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~That was when those friends of Gracie's must have gotten them.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~Gracie的那些朋友肯定就是在那时候拿到的。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~I know I'm too good for him, but sometimes a guy has got to hang out with lowlifes like Niko here.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~我知道我比Niko强太多了，不过有时候就是得跟他这样的底层人一起出去。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~You're a prince, Niko. We got the fucks.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~你真够猛，Niko。我们解决那群混蛋了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~It can't be the only card he's got to play.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~这总不会是他手里的最后一张牌吧。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Give us that fucking ice, you're trapped.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~把钻石交出来，你无路可逃了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~She can't speak. We got a gag in her mouth.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~她回答不了，嘴被我们堵上了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Shit, I don't wanna spend another minute in this crap-hole, let's get outta here.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~操，我不想在这个粪坑里多待一秒了，我们赶紧走吧。
~z~对那个混蛋来说也是一种解脱。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~What in Christ's name went on back there anyways?
~z~It's gonna be a nice thing to mull over. You know, while he's staring at them metal bars for the next decade or so.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~反倒是很适合拿去苦思冥想。你也知道，在他盯铁窗盯个十年之类的时候。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Niko Bellic, how is it that whenever something is stolen from me you are not far away?
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~Niko Bellic，怎么每次我东西被偷都能在附近找到你？

GM5AUD.original: ~z~They ain't getting back up, Niko. We put the bastards down.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~他们没有支援了，Niko。我们干掉了他们。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~He coulda walked away from there. Instead, he's fucked and the diamonds are who knows where.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~大可放他走人。结果呢，他被搞了，也没人能知道钻石的下落。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~The bastards didn't hurt you, did they?
~z~Like a house on fire, ain't that right, Gracie?
~z~I have never stolen anything from you, Mr. Bulgarin.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~我从来没偷过你的东西，Bulgarin先生。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~There ain't much that could cheer him up now that he thinks he's doing serious time,
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~现在他日子不好过，本来就没多少能激励他的东西，

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Don't nobody having them. Screw all of you!
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~索性谁都拿不到，全都见鬼去吧！

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Is it finally beginning to sink in that my sister's chastity belt don't come off?
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~你终于明白了吗，我妹妹的贞操带是拿不下来的？

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Okay, so we exchanged Gracie for some diamonds that Ray used to have.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~好了，就是我们用Gracie换来了以前属于Ray的钻石。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~I fucking hate the both of you.
~z~I'm screwed either way. If I don't give you the diamonds, you kill me here and you take 'em.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~反正我怎么着都是死。不给你们钻石，你们就会当场杀了我拿走它。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~At least I'm gonna be on the other side of some bulletproof glass to him.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~至少我还没有跟他在防弹玻璃的同一边。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~We was outnumbered, Niko. I can see how he thought it was covered.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~我们被人数压制了，Niko。我能想到他觉得自己优势很大。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~We leave and you pick up the stuff. Entiende?
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~我们走了，你再把东西拿走。懂了吗？

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Get in cover behind them pipes, Niko!
~z~That might be okay where you're from, Niko. But this is an enlightened society we live in.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~在你老家可能可以，Niko。但我们这儿可是开明社会。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~I do give you the diamonds, Mr. Bulgarin kills me later.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~要是我把钻石给你们，Bulgarin先生之后会杀了我。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~An example to the rest of the world.
~z~I had to leave Europe because of him.
~z~There's guys above us. Get them, Niko.
~z~You're telling me. We woulda let him live.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~完全同意。我们应该留他一命的。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~They were not Ray's, I can tell you this much.
~z~This is not the first time he has assumed that I will be killed by some of his employees.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~这已经不是他第一次以为我能被他的几个手下解决了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Some time ago, I worked for Mr. Bulgarin in Europe, smuggling people across the Adriatic.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~之前有段时间，我替Bulgarin先生在欧洲干活，通过亚得里亚海贩卖人口。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Use the pipes for cover, come on man.
~z~The guy with the ice has got to be this way.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~拿了钻石的那人肯定在这里。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~We ain't exactly got much to exchange now, do we? Shit.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~看来我们没有交易的筹码了，对吧？妈的。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~A lot of people are going to be upset about that.
~z~At least you didn't get what you wanted.
~z~Fuck Niko, there's some guys up there.
~z~Maybe they belong to this homosexual man, Gracie's friend. I don't know. Maybe to Bulgarin.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~可能属于这个男同性恋，Gracie的朋友。我不清楚。也可能是Bulgarin。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~There's always one who ruins it for everybody else in the class.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~总有一颗老鼠屎会坏了一锅粥。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Jesus Christ, why did that moron have to throw the ice away? It was just plain selfish.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~我的天哪，为什么那个蠢货要扔掉钻石？完全就是自私嘛。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Gracie, watch your mouth. Niko is good friend of mine. Don't say that about him.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~Gracie，嘴巴干净点。Niko是我的好朋友。别那么说他。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Maybe you should bind and gag all the girls you meet?
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~以后你见到姑娘就先绑上绳子贴块胶布吧？

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Jesus, Niko. You're gonna get killed. Get some cover.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~天哪，Niko。这样会没命的。找个掩体。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Let's split up. I'll take the high road and you take the low road.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~分头行动，我走上路，你走下路。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~You know what, I'm still fucking scared.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~说句实话，我他妈还是有点怕的。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Real enlightened, real civilized. That's the impression I've got so far.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~真是开明，真是文明。和我至今的印象完全一致。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Alright, Niko. The exchange is over on Charge Island at the water treatment plant.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~好了，Niko。人质交易将在Charge岛的污水处理厂进行。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~You know what, I'm still fucking scared.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~说句实话，我他妈还是有点怕的。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Packie will give you a call and explain.
~z~Probably a good thing you got out though. Wouldn't a met me if you'd stayed, would ya?
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~不过你出来了也算是件好事。你呆在那儿就遇不到我了，不是吗？

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Give us that fucking ice, you're trapped.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~把钻石交出来，你无路可逃了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Fuck me, a whole load of them are showing up.
~z~Shit, these diamonds have been trouble since Ray first made me take them out of a trash can for him.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~操，从Ray让我把钻石从垃圾堆捞出来的时候开始，它就带来了麻烦。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~That's right, he is definitely a bad influence on me.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~是这样，他完全就是在带坏我。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Gracie, it's been too long. We should hang out more often.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~Gracie，好久不见啊。我们应该多出去转转的。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~This is the place, the exchange is happening at the back. Get us in there.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~This is the place, the exchange is happening at the back. Get us in there.

GM5AUD.original: ~z~At least I'm gonna be on the other side of some bulletproof glass to him.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~至少我还没有跟他在防弹玻璃的同一边。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~It ain't gonna to make a blind bit of difference to me.
~z~Do you want me to spell it out?
~z~Then some Russian turns up saying they're his. Then everything goes to shit. That's about right, isn't it?
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~然后就有个俄国佬跳出来说钻石是他的。之后情况就完全不对了。是这样子没错吧？

GM5AUD.original: ~z~You're in a mood, ain't ya Niko?
~z~Looks like our joyful time with her is coming to an end.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~看来我们和她的欢乐时光要结束了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Jesus, Niko. There's more of the bastards arriving.
~z~That rule even works for wishes as cheerful as yours.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~你这种令人愉快的愿望也不例外。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~You don't get nothing now, you greedy fools.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~你们什么都别想得倒，贪婪的白痴。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~See you Niko, I've got to go break the news to Gerald.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~再见Niko，我还得把这个大消息告诉Gerald。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Here we are, the party is happening in the back. Gracie's friends should be waiting.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~Here we are, the party is happening in the back. Gracie's friends should be waiting.

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Hands off my woman, Bellic. Gracie and me is in love.
~z~You normally just shove so much coke up a girl's nose she may as well be tied up.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~可卡因往姑娘鼻子上一洒，能不服服帖帖吗。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Well, Niko. That was a whole lot of effort for no fucking reward.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，Niko。又是屁回报都没有，工夫倒是费了不少。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~See, she was just telling me how much she loved me. What do ya think of Niko, Gracie?
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~你看看，她又在跟我说她爱我有多深了。你觉得Niko怎么样，Gracie？

GM5AUD.original: ~z~There's nothing right about this situation, but that would be an accurate description of what went down.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~对情况的描述没有一个对的，但是对于发生了什么描述的还是很到位。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~It is the story of a lot of lives, Packie. I'm getting used to hearing it.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~是很多人的日常，Packie。这话我都快听习惯了。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Fuck you, fuck you, fuck you, fuck you.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~操你妈，操你妈，操你妈，操你妈。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Piece of shit does not even stay at a fight to see the outcome.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~这个人渣甚至都没有留下来看看结果。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~My cousin and I moved up to Bohan to get away from him and another man called Dimitri Rascalov.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~我的堂兄和我搬到了Bohan，好避开他和另一个叫Dimitri Rascalov的人。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~See you Niko, I've got to go break the news to Gerald.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~再见Niko，我还得把这个大消息告诉Gerald。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Packie, my man. How are you and Gracie getting on?
~z~If I can get what went on straight in my head in the first place, that is.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~不过前提是我能弄明白刚才的状况。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Fuck, he weren't too chipper the last time I spoke to him and he's gonna be a long way from chipper when I tell him what went down.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~操，上次我跟他交谈的时候他就没什么生气，这次的事讲完他还不得直接断气。

GM5AUD.original: ~z~Alright, we're meant to meet them around the back a this place. Keep an eye out.
GM5AUD.translated: ~z~Alright, we're meant to meet them around the back a this place. Keep an eye out.
